mapper.sql: eId, userName, pwd, eName, eSex, email, eTel, eAddress, eBirthday, dId, rId
mapper.select: select from emp where userName=#{emp.username} and pwd=#{emp.pwd}
mapper.insert: insert into emp (eId, userName, pwd, eName, eSex, email, eTel, eAddress, eBirthday, dId, rId) values (#{eid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{esex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{etel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ebirthday,jdbcType=DATE}, #{did,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rid,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into emp
eId,
userName,
pwd,
eName,
eSex,
email,
eTel,
eAddress,
eBirthday,
dId,
rId,
#{eid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{ename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{esex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update emp
userName = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pwd = #{pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
eName = #{ename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
eSex = #{esex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
eTel = #{etel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
eAddress = #{eaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
eBirthday = #{ebirthday,jdbcType=DATE},
dId = #{did,jdbcType=INTEGER},
rId = #{rid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where eId = #{eid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update emp set userName = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pwd = #{pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, eName = #{ename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, eSex = #{esex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, eTel = #{etel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, eAddress = #{eaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, eBirthday = #{ebirthday,jdbcType=DATE}, dId = #{did,jdbcType=INTEGER}, rId = #{rid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where eId = #{eid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
